attributes.action: hold somerset county council elections due to the massive rejection of unitary status by the people of Somerset.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of Somerset rejected the idea of unitary status by a massive amount. Surely, such a large rejection must bring into question the status/validity of the county councillors. The County Councilliors who voted for the proposal should have to sit by-elections in their seats to ensure that they still have the publics trust.
